text: América Futebol Clube, commonly known as América, or as América-AL, is a Brazilian football club based in São Luís do Quitunde, Alagoas state. ==History== The club was founded on June 8, 1952. ==Stadium== América Futebol Clube play their home games at Estádio Municipal Eduardo de Melo Gonçalves, nicknamed Eduardão. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 1,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1952 Category:Football clubs in Alagoas Category:1952 establishments in Brazil
title: América Futebol Clube (AL)
